ygData.subject: Maestro of Rancor
ygData.msgSnippet: Maestro of Rancor dropped the Evensong on Saturday night.  Second one on our server to my knowledge.  I know the bard with the first drop. Members of the
ygData.messageBody:
Maestro of Rancor dropped the Evensong on Saturday night. Second
one on our server to my knowledge. I know the bard with the first
drop.

Members of the Pantheon killed him after they themselves had perished
twice to the bugger and us once. I swear the guy was doing donuts
around the plane looking for people to kill. That, and the 4 mob
train he was carrying around with him didn't help.

Needless to say, I was the only bard on the plane at the time.
Unfortunately, I have to wait until Maestro drops another, since
the weapon was 'accidentally' looted by someone who cannot use it.
<sigh>

Do you use your evensong over your yk, Shada?

Harmonic.
